name: Jam Club Want Dance
description:
UPDATE: We just made a  new update to get a release working for you. You can download it HERE!! Enjoy and sorry for the previous bugged version! :)  

Random Games

___________________________________________________________________________________________

Sadly, the tittle screen is bugged, so the game is unplayable till jam voting ends, and itch.io allow us to update it. Feel free to follow us or add it to your collection to get notifications when the stable version is released. Thanks! :D

This is a fighting game without player agency nor punches, instead you tap different rhythmic patterns to dance with sweet poses. Chain them to perform a combo and bust a move that serves as dodging for the attacks of the opponent. Be careful to make the right choice or you could end receiving a punch triying to dodge a kick.  But over all... don't miss the groove!
